tasya vācakam ākāram uddharet manasā sudhīḥ
jñāna tvāt aprameyaḥ ca prathamaḥ vyāpakaḥ smṛtaḥ
ānandaḥ ādidevaḥ ca gopanaḥ ca iti ṣaḍvidhāḥ
kramāt saṃhṛtya tat jñānam sāṃkarṣaṇam anuttam
tad tad viśeṣa saṃyogāt viśeṣyaḥ tad mayaḥ sadā
iti ā bhāva samāyogāt jñāna ātmā mantra rāj svayam
hṛdayāya namaḥ paścāt vyakti artham saṃprayojayet  /
śiraḥ mantraḥ

original: p. 171) ramaṇīyā samiddhā ca yecchā devasya śāśvatī |
analyzed: ramaṇīyā samiddhā ca yā icchā devasya śāśvatī
sarvatra apratighā divyā hi amṛta ādhāra bheditā
vi iti bījena nirdiṣṭā tat ca aiśvaryam mahat hareḥ

original: aiśvaryaṃ ca śiraḥsthāne yattat sarvopari sthitam || 19-7 ||
analyzed: aiśvaryam ca śiraḥ sthāne yat tat sarva upari sthitam
avighāta ātmakam yat tat icchāyāḥ rūpam uttamam
samiddham ramaṇīyam tat amṛtasya āśrayaḥ paraḥ
vi iti tad dyotakam bījam tena saṃyojayet śiraḥ
tena saṃyojitaḥ cakra mantraḥ aiśvarya bṛṃhitaḥ
icchām indhānaḥ eva asya mantriṇaḥ saṃprakāśate
tatas tad śirase svāhā vyakti artham saṃprayojayet
śikhā mantraḥ

original: amṛtā somarūpā ca yā sā tṛptimayī parā |
analyzed: amṛtā soma rūpā ca yā sā tṛpti mayī parā
jagat prakṛtiḥ īśānā viṣṇu śaktiḥ parāvarā
tasyāḥ yaḥ bhuvana ākāraḥ uddāmaḥ udayaḥ umalaḥ
iti evam samākhyātā śaktiḥ tena uditā satī  /
viśeṣayati rūpeṇa cakra mantram sanātanam

original: tayā sa bheditaḥ śaktyā śaktyātmā saṃprakāśate || 19-13 ||
analyzed: tayā sa bheditaḥ śaktyā śaktyā ātmā saṃprakāśate
yā sā kuṇḍalinī śaktiḥ hṛdaya sthā samīritā

original: p. 172) yogibhiryā śikhā tasyā divyā dīpākṛtiḥ parā || 19-14 ||
analyzed: yogibhiḥ yā śikhā tasyāḥ divyā dīpa ākṛtiḥ parā
prasarati ūrdhva bhāge tu śikhā sthāne virājate
atas śakteḥ śikhā sthāne nyāsaḥ tasyāḥ tatas smṛtaḥ
śikhāyai vaṣaṭ iti evam vyakti artham saṃprayojayet
kavaca mantraḥ

original: ūrjo nāma samuddiṣṭo balaṃ viṣṇoḥ svamūrjitam || 19-16 ||
analyzed: ūrjaḥ nāma samuddiṣṭaḥ balam viṣṇoḥ svam ūrjitam
prajñā dhāraṇa sāmarthyam nitya tṛpti mayam param
sarva kāryaiḥ samudyuktaḥ śrama abhāve hi tṛpyati
aśeṣa bhuvana ādhāraḥ tat balam parigīyate

original: bale balaṃ dhāraṇeddhā bibharti sakalaṃ jagat || 19-18 ||
analyzed: bale balam dhāraṇeddhā bibharti sakalam jagat
catur gati mayam yat tat prāṇānām parigīyate
vyāna apāna ādikā sā ca proktā gati catuṣṭayī
catur gati mayaḥ prāṇaḥ balam tat parigīyate
ajitaḥ bhagavān yena jayati akhilam acyutaḥ
etaiḥ guṇaiḥ samāyuktam balam tat vaiṣṇavam mahat
aprameyam anādyam tat sūrya śabdena gīyate
balena bheditaḥ mantraḥ bala ātmā vyavatiṣṭhate
balam ca akhila gātreṣu mūrchitam vipulam mahat
aṃsayoḥ tad abhivyaktiḥ atas tatra eva vinyaset
kavacāya hum iti eva vyakti artham saṃprayojayet  /
astramantraḥ
mahat tā nyūna tā bhāvaḥ sa ca syāt avikāri tā
cetana acetanam viśvam sva saṃkalpena bhāvayan
yaḥ syāt avikṛtaḥ saḥ asya bhāvaḥ mahā su darśanaḥ
tat vīryam tat ca śāstra uktam yat duṣṭa damana ātmakam
śānti dam sarva pāpānām śaṃkaram jagatām api
vikāra virahaḥ daitya mardinaḥ paramātmanaḥ
mahāsudarśana iti evam tat viryam bahudhā ucyate
vīryeṇa bheditaḥ mantraḥ vīrya ātmā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: tasya hastatale sthāne tatastat tatra vinyaset || 19-28 ||
analyzed: tasya hasta tale sthāne tatas tat tatra vinyaset  /
tatas ustrāya phaṭ iti evam vyakti artham saṃprayojayet
netra mantraḥ
antar bodha svarūpaḥ yaḥ prākṛta dhvānta nāśanaḥ
sūrya vat tapataḥ tasya yā jvālā api ūrdhva gāminī
puruṣāṇām aśeṣāṇām aiśvaryāt nirapekṣa tā
amṛta ādhāra rūpa tvam aniśam janma ghātakam

original: p. 174) nairapekṣyeṇa yat tasya tat tejaḥ samudāhṛtam || 19-31 ||
analyzed: nairapekṣyeṇa yat tasya tat tejaḥ samudāhṛtam
jvālā śabdena tat tejaḥ vaiṣṇavam bahudhā īryate
tejasā bheditaḥ mantraḥ tejaḥ rūpaḥ uvatiṣṭhate
tejasaḥ nayanam sthānam atas tat tatra vinyaset
vauṣaṭ netratrayāya iti vyatyāsāt vyaktaye paṭhet
iti ṣāḍguṇya rūpā iyam darśitā teṅga saṃtatiḥ
upāṅga saṃtatiḥ ca eva nyasanīyā vipaścitā
upāṅga mantraḥ
kukṣi pṛṣṭha aṃsa yugma ūru jānu pāda yugeṣu ca
śādi arṇān vyāpi saṃyuktān jñāna ādyaiḥ namasā saha
vinyaset ṣaḍguṇa ātmā eva mantri dehaḥ prajāyate
aprameyaḥ gada dhvaṃsī panthāḥ svarga apavargayoḥ
icchā mayaḥ hi yaḥ bhāvaḥ viṣṇu saṃkalpa jṛmbhitaḥ
aśeṣa durita ploṣāt saḥ ugniḥ iti ucyate budhaiḥ
agninā bheditaḥ mantraḥ tu agni ātmā vyavatiṣṭhate
prākāram kalpayet tena paritas pāvaka ākṛtim
agni prākāra madhya sthaḥ durnirīkṣaḥ abhijāyate
saṃsmaran cakra gāyatrīm paritas cakra mudrayā
ūrdhva adhas tiryak ākāram mudrayet ātmanaḥ bahis
agni prākārataḥ pūrvam cakra mudrā athavā bhavet
cakra gāyatrī
hṛdayam ca atha cakrāya vidmahepadam ādimam
mantranāthasya netra ādi padam dhīmahi
gāyatryāḥ ādi navame tatas ca eva anivāritaḥ

original: tataḥ samastarūpaṃ tu gāyatryā daśamaṃ padam || 19-42 ||
analyzed: tatas samasta rūpam tu gāyatryāḥ daśamam padam
uditā cakra gāyatrī saptaviṃśati kīrtitā
atha saudarśana astrāṇām mantrān etān nibodha me
cakra ādi astra mantrāḥ

original: oṃ namo bhagavan viṣṇo sarveṣāmādimaṃ samam |
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavan viṣṇo sarveṣām ādimam samam
cakra mūrti dharā iti evam gadā mūrti dharā iti ca
śārṅga mūrti dharā iti evam khaḍga mūrti dharā iti ca
cakra ādi astra catuṣkam tu tatas senāpate padam
sarvatra samam uccārya vadet prātisvikam tatas
mantranāthaḥ bhavet cakre gada ādiṣu
kaumodaki mahāśarṅga mahā khaḍga iti udīrayet
varma astre ca tatas yuñjyāt eṣa mauna vidhi kramaḥ
imāḥ catasraḥ gāyatryaḥ cakra ādīnām udīritāḥ
śaṅkha ādīnām caturṇām tu mantrān etān nibodha me
śaṅkha ādi mantrāḥ

original: p. 176) oṃ namo bhagavan viṣṇo sarveṣāmāditaḥ samam |
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavant viṣṇo sarveṣām āditas samam
śaṅkha mūrti dharā iti evam hala mūrti dharā iti ca
musala mūrti dharā iti evam śūla mūrti dharā iti ca
senāpate padam paścāt sarveṣām tulyam uccaret  /
pāñcajanyāya svāhā iti eka adhikaḥ manuḥ
mahāhalāya svāhā iti mantraḥ api eka adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ
mahā ca musalāya atha svāhā iti abhyadhikaḥ manuḥ
mahā śūlāya svāhā iti sa ca api abhyadhikaḥ manuḥ  /
imāḥ catasraḥ gāyatryaḥ śaṅkha ādīnām pradarśitāḥ
daṇḍa ādīnām atha aṣṭānām imān mantrān nibodha me
daṇḍa ādi astra mantrāḥ

original: oṃ namo bhagavan viṣṇo sarveṣāmāditaḥ samam |
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavan viṣṇo sarveṣām āditas samam
daṇḍa mūrti dharā iti evam kunta mūrti dharā iti ca
śakti mūrti dharā iti evam pāśa mūrti dharā iti ca
aṅkuśa mūrti dharāya kuliśa mūrti dhara iti ca
paraśu mūrti dharāya atha tatas śatamukhā iti ca
anala mūrti dharā iti evam prātisvika pada kramaḥ
senāpate padam paścāt sarveṣā samam uccaret

original: p. 177) mahādaṇḍāyātha namo mantra evādhikaḥ smṛtaḥ || 19-57 ||
analyzed: mahādaṇḍāya atha namaḥ mantraḥ eva adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ
mahākuntāya atha namaḥ mantraḥ api ekaḥ adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ
mahā śaktaye ca namaḥ mantraḥ api ekaḥ adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ
mahāpāśāya atha namaḥ mantraḥ api ekaḥ adhikaḥ smṛtaḥ
mahā aṅkuśāya namaḥ iti eṣa api adhikaḥ ucyate

original: mahā ca kuliśāyātha nama ityapi tādṛśaḥ |
analyzed: mahā ca kuliśāya atha namaḥ iti api tādṛśaḥ
mahā paraśave ca atha namaḥ iti api tādṛśaḥ
mahā śata mukha iti evam analāya tatas namaḥ
ayam mantraḥ trayastriṃśat varṇaḥ vahni ayuta prabhaḥ
iti astrāṇām ime mantrāḥ rūpataḥ te nidarśitāḥ
atra anuktasya saṃhitā antarāt grahaṇam
ādhāra ādi āsana ākāraḥ dvāra paryanta pūjanam

original: mudrā ca vividhākārā yasya yasya ca yādṛśī |
analyzed: mudrā ca vividha ākārā yasya yasya ca yādṛśī
abhiṣeka vidhiḥ ca eva dīkṣā niyamaḥ eva ca
bhūtaśuddhi vidhiḥ ca eva dhyānāni vividhāni ca
sarvam jaya aśrutam kāryam tat tat vaiśeṣikam vinā
amudrāṇām iha astrāṇām daṇḍa ādīnām mahā mune
kāryā samanvitā divyā śakti mudrā astra mudrayā

original: p. 78) iti te leśataḥ proktaḥ saudarśanavidhikramaḥ |
analyzed: iti te leśataḥ proktaḥ saudarśana vidhi kramaḥ
grahaṇa ādi prakāraḥ iyam vakṣyate śṛṇu tam mune
iti śrī pāñcarātre tantra rahasye ahirbudhnyasaṃhitāyām
aṅgopāṅgamantroddhāraḥ nāma ekonaviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
āditaḥ ślokāḥ
mantragrahaṇādidīkṣāvidhānam nāma viṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
dhyātam sakṛt bhavān eka koṭi agha ogham harati aram
sudarśanasya tat divyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi
ācārya lakṣaṇam
ahirbudhnyaḥ
a vaktā ca apavādānām akartā pāpa karmaṇām
amatsarī para utkarṣe para duḥkhe ghṛṇā paraḥ
dayāvān sarva bhūteṣu hṛṣṭaḥ para sukha udaye
puṇyeṣu muditā yuktaḥ upekṣāvān ku buddhiṣu
tantrāṇām antara jñaḥ ca mantrāṇām kṛtya tattva vid
pada vākya pramāṇa jñaḥ hetuvāda vicakṣaṇaḥ
sāmānyasya apavādasya vettā yantra vicakṣaṇaḥ
adhyātma jñāna kuśalaḥ śāntaḥ dāntaḥ jita indriyaḥ
sat anvavāya saṃbhūtaḥ ācāryaḥ nāma vaiṣṇavaḥ
śiṣya lakṣaṇam
ācāryam āśrayet śiṣyaḥ śreyaḥ arthī su samāhitaḥ
vinaya vrata śālī ca dvijātiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ śuciḥ
brahmacarya paraḥ dhīmān sva dāra nirataḥ athavā
acchalena yathāvat sva kṛta akṛta nivedakaḥ
saṃsāra aṅgāra madhya sthaḥ pacyamānaḥ sva karmabhiḥ
bhavantam śaraṇam prāptaḥ upasannaḥ asmi adhīhi bhoḥ
iti evam pratipadyeta śiṣyaḥ ācārya sattamam
dīkṣā kramaḥ
iti evam saṃprapannāya śiṣyāya ācchala vādine
pratyakṣābhiḥ parokṣābhiḥ upādhibhiḥ anekadhā
śodhitāya eka rūpāya rahasya āmnāya gopine  /
aśaṭhāya anasūyāya lobha moha ādi a sevine
saṃvatsaram parīkṣya evam paritas paritas dhiyā

original: p. 181) niṣkampāya vadedvidyāṃ yāvatī yādṛśī ca sā |
analyzed: niṣkampāya vadet vidyām yāvatī yādṛśī ca sā
aṅganyāsa karanyāsau
mātṛkām āditas devīm vinyaset vapuṣi svake
aṅganyāsa karanyāsau mantra varṇaiḥ samācaret
mṛjet prakoṣṭham ekaikam tris mantreṇa trirūpiṇā
evam pāṇi tala dvandvam aṅgulīṣu atha vinyaset
ubhābhyām madhyama agrābhyām ubhayasmin tala dvaye
tārakam tārikām lakṣmīm praṇava ādi anta gām nyaset
praṇava ādi anta gam somam madhyama iṅguṣṭha parvaṇi
sa bindum vinyaset prāṇam eva tarjani parvaṇi
nyaset varṇān tṛtīya ādīn aṅguli antara parvasu
lāṅgalam parama astram tu nyaset ūrdhva aṅgulīṣu atha
ṛṣi ādīnām sthāna bhedaḥ
ṛṣim śirasi vinyasyet chandaḥ vadana gocaram
nārāyaṇam anādi antam devatām hṛdaye smaret
para sūkṣma sthūla mantrāṇām ṛṣayaḥ
parākārasya mantrasya paramātmā ṛṣiḥ smṛtaḥ  /
saṃkarṣaṇaḥ tu sūkṣmasya sthūlasya aham ṛṣiḥ smṛtaḥ
sudarśana mantrasya ātharvaṇa veda sāratama tvam

original: p. 182) atharvāṅgiraso nāma pañca śākhā mahāmune || 20-21 ||
analyzed: atharva aṅgirasaḥ nāma pañca śākhāḥ mahā mune

original: tāsu tvantarhito divyaḥ kṛtānto mantrarāṭ svayam |
analyzed: tāsu tu antarhitaḥ divyaḥ kṛtāntaḥ mantrarāj svayam
saṃkarṣaṇa ājñayā ahirbudhnyena tad uddharaṇam

original: mayā tretāyugādau tu taptvā varṣāyutaṃ tapaḥ || 20-22 ||
analyzed: mayā tretā yuga ādau tu taptvā varṣa ayutam tapaḥ

original: sarva ātharvaṇo vedo mathitastu śanaiḥ śanaiḥ || 20-23 ||
analyzed: sarvaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ mathitaḥ tu śanais śanais
mathyamānāt tatas tasmāt dadhnaḥ ghṛtam iva uddhṛtaḥ
mantraḥ yam sa parīvāraḥ sa aṅga upāṅgaḥ sanātanaḥ
sthūlasya mantranāthasya tatas mām ṛṣim ūcire

original: daivī brāhmī tathārṣī ca gāyatrī chanda ucyate || 20-25 ||
analyzed: daivī brāhmī tathā ārṣī ca gāyatrī chandaḥ ucyate

original: paraḥ sūkṣmastathā sthūlaḥ paramātmā ca devatā |
analyzed: paraḥ sūkṣmaḥ tathā sthūlaḥ paramātmā ca devatā
vinyaset atha gātreṣu mantranātham sanātanam
para sūkṣma ādi bhāvena soma arka anala dīdhitim
praṇava ādi trayam mūrdhni lalāṭe somam eva ca

original: āsye sūryaṃ gale srāṃ ca hṛdi raṃ nābhigaṃ tu huṃ |
analyzed: āsye sūryam gale srāṃ ca hṛdi raṃ nābhi gam tu hum
mūlādhāre tu phaṭkāram tāra ādi tritayam hṛdi

original: p. 183) nābhau samūlagaṃ haṃ ca pādayoḥ srāṃ ca raṃ hṛdi |
analyzed: nābhau sa mūla gam haṃ ca pādayoḥ srāṃ ca raṃ hṛdi

original: huṃ vaktre phaṭ śirodeśe tataḥ sarvātmanā kriyā || 20-29 ||
analyzed: hum vaktre phaṭ śiraḥ deśe tatas sarva ātmanā kriyā
aṅga upāṅga nyāsaḥ
hṛdaya ādīni atha aṅgāni sveṣu sthāneṣu vinyaset
upāṅgeṣu tathā nyāsam māntraiḥ varṇaiḥ samācaret  /
dehasya tredhā vibhāvanam
sthūla sūkṣma para tvena deham vidyāt tatas tridhā
aṅga pratyaṅga kośa āḍhyam pratyakṣam sthūlam ucyate
puryaṣṭakam tu sūkṣma ākhyam paramāṇavaḥ ucyate
vahni arka koṭi saṃkāśa jvālā kolāhala ākule
trividhe mantranāthe ismin trividham bhāvayet vapuḥ
tejaḥ divyam mahat śubhram manaḥ stham hṛd stham avyayam
nārāyaṇa mayam dhyāyet ātmānam jyotiṣām patim
tatas tat cakra madhya akṣa soma sūrya anala ātmani
majjayitvā svam ātmānam nirvāsanam atha uddharet
sṛṣṭi nyāsaḥ
tatas para ādi bhāva sthān mantranāthān sanātanān

original: p. 184) tenaiva kramayogena tanūstā visṛjet punaḥ |
analyzed: tena eva krama yogena tanūḥ tāḥ visṛjet punar
tāsu praveśya ca ātmānam punar nyāsam samācaret  /
hasta deha ādi gaḥ nyāsaḥ yāvat pūrvam udāhṛtaḥ
śiṣya avekṣaṇam
atha mantra tanuḥ divyaḥ mantra ātmā mantra sārathiḥ
viṣṇu saṃkalpa jam rūpam vahan saudarśanam vapuḥ
netraiḥ śiṣyam avekṣeta vahni arka indu mayaiḥ kramāt
śiṣyasya saṃhāra nyāsaḥ
atha sthūla ādi bhāvena dahet mantreṇa tad dhiyā
pūrva ukta krama yogena śiṣya ātmānam parātmani
sṛṣṭi nyāsaḥ
nimajjayitvā iti ādyam tu kramam sarvam samācaret
manasā śuṣka dagdha utthe śiṣya dehe tathā tathā
vinyaset krama yogena mantra nyāsam dhiyā tatas
mantra upadeśaḥ
atha tasya upadeṣṭavyaḥ saha aṅgaḥ mantranāyakaḥ

original: sārthaḥ sapratipattiśca yo yo bhāvaḥ puroditaḥ |
analyzed: sa arthaḥ sa pratipattiḥ ca yaḥ yaḥ bhāvaḥ purā uditaḥ

original: p. 185) evaṃ gṛhītamātre tu mantranāthe sanātane || 20-42 ||
analyzed: evam gṛhīta mātre tu mantranāthe sanātane
utpadyate svayam citte pratyayaḥ deva nirmitaḥ
śiṣya kṛtyam
samyak ittham gṛhītena mantreṇa anena mantra vid
kṛtārtham manyamānaḥ svam gurave itha nivedayet
ātmānam atha ca ātmīyam yat kiṃcid uta vidyate

original: vinā pāpamaniṣṭaṃ ca sarvaṃ tasmai nivedayet |
analyzed: vinā pāpam aniṣṭam ca sarvam tasmai nivedayet
evam nivedya manvīta kṛtārthaḥ ham iti svayam
evaṃdhiyaḥ hi acchalena mantraḥ svena prakāśate
dīkṣayā dīkṣayitvā atha pātrayitvā athavā dhiyā
saṃskāreṇa ātharvaṇena yat vā saṃskṛtya mantrataḥ
mantraḥ ayam upadeṣṭavyaḥ guruṇā guru sevinaḥ
ittham grahaṇa siddhena sādhanena atha vāgyataḥ
mantreṇa anena siddhena kuryāt loka hitam sudhīḥ

mūrtimadbhiḥ ca sa udyogaiḥ sarva ābharaṇa saṃyutaiḥ
etaiḥ pañjaritam dhyāyet yantrarājam anuttamam
paritas mūrtimat saṃhāra astra dhyānam
paritas tāni api dhyāyet mūrtimanti mahānti ca
saṃhāra astrāṇi sarvāṇi sa añjalīni adbhutāni ca
akutobhaya śālīni śaktimanti samantataḥ
tatas mūrtimat pravartaka astra dhyānam
tatas pravartakāni evam dhyāyīta astrāṇi nārada
mūrtāni attum iva aśeṣa bhuvanāni ujjvalāni ca
tatas nārasiṃha dhyānam
evam cakra krameṇa etat abhidhyāya upari smaret
dadhānam nārasiṃhasya vapuḥ nārāyaṇam param
mūlakośam param devam adhobhāga itha cintayet  /
yantram cakra ākṛti śrīmat dīpta nemi samanvitam
catur dikṣu mahā jvālām vicintayet
cakra kaumodakī śārṅga khaḍga hastān smaret kramāt
evam eka mukham dhyāyet yantrasya asya mahā dyuteḥ
apara aṅgam mahā mantraiḥ sarvatas samalaṃkṛtam

original: p. 246) antastāraṃ samārabhya yadi vā viṣṇupañjaram || 36-19 ||
analyzed: antar tāram samārabhya yadi vā viṣṇupañjaram
pūrva uktam tat vinā mūrteḥ tad tad mantra samuccayam
apara aṅge sarva astrāṇām mantra mātra dhyānam

original: yathāsthānaṃ smaret tasya paryante cintayet tataḥ || 36-20 ||
analyzed: yathāsthānam smaret tasya paryante cintayet tatas
sarva saṃharaṇa astrāṇām mantrān eva ca kevalam
tad anantaram anyeṣām astrāṇām ca pravartakam
mantra jālam abhidhyāya sunemi sura pūjitam
mahā yantram mahā śakti cakra rūpam anuttamam
uktaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ juṣṭam sarva kāma eka sādhanam

original: asya cakrasya madhye yadvartate puruṣaḥ paraḥ || 36-23 ||
analyzed: asya cakrasya madhye yat vartate puruṣaḥ paraḥ
tasmāt nigadyate loke cakravartī iti sūribhiḥ
etad yantra abhyarcanāt rājñām cakravarti tva lābhaḥ
tasmāt abhyarcayet etat yaḥ rājā bhakti saṃyutaḥ
saḥ ucireṇa eva kālena cakravarti tvam āpnuyāt
anyaiḥ api rāja hita eṣibhiḥ etat arcanam kāryam

original: rājā vā rājabhṛtyā vā mantriṇo vāthavā pare || 36-25 ||
analyzed: rājā vā rāja bhṛtyāḥ vā mantriṇaḥ vā athavā pare
rājñām hita eṣiṇaḥ sarve pūjayeyuḥ idam param
anyeṣām api śrī kāmānām etat abhyarcanam

original: anye ca ye tu vipulāṃ śriyamicchanti mānavāḥ || 36-26 ||
analyzed: anye ca ye tu vipulām śriyam icchanti mānavāḥ
taiḥ nityam arcanīyam syāt idam sarva artha sādhakam
rājñām eva viśeṣeṇa yat etat samudīritam
tad rāja vyatirekeṇa ye nirdiṣṭāḥ tu mānavāḥ
teṣām vibhūtiḥ mahatī rājñā saṃpatsyate dhruvam

original: lohairvā śilayā vāpi yo hi nirmāya pūjayet |
analyzed: lohaiḥ vā śilayā vā api yaḥ hi nirmāya pūjayet
vipulām śriyam āpnoti dīrgham āyuḥ ca vindati
ārogyam ca aśnute sarve tad vaṃśyāḥ dīrgha jīvinaḥ
dvi mukha yantra arcane mantra upadeṣṭuḥ brāhmaṇasya eva adhikāraḥ
param mantra upadeṣṭā eva brāhmaṇaḥ dvi mukham yajet
jñānena tapasā śaktyā soḍhum tasya ubhaya ātmanaḥ

original: sa eva śakruyāt tasya prabhāvaṃ paramaṃ mune || 36-31 ||
analyzed: saḥ eva tasya prabhāvam paramam mune
āditya maṇḍala akṣi ādi sthānām puruṣāṇām abhinna tvam
yaḥ asau āditya bimba sthaḥ puruṣaḥ dṛśyate paraḥ
hiraṇmayaḥ yaḥ eva antar akṣiṇi api ca dṛśyate

original: so'pyayaṃ nābhicakrasya madhye yo vartate pumān |
analyzed: saḥ upi ayam nābhi cakrasya madhye yaḥ vartate pumān
yaḥ ayam kāla ākhya cakrasya prerakaḥ puruṣaḥ vyayaḥ
yuga cakrasya netāram enam eva viduḥ budhāḥ
enam mahā ṛṣayaḥ upi āhuḥ jagat cakra pravartakam
vimāne saṃsthāpya tasya eva
samabhyarcanam aihika āmuṣmika phala sādhakam
sarva loka eka kartāram sarva loka eka sākṣiṇam
enam vimāne saṃsthāpya cakravartinam avyayam
yaḥ pūjayati tasya ayam lokaḥ ca āmuṣmikaḥ bhavet
vimāna karaṇa ārambhasya api mahā phalaka tvam
sudarśana vimānam yaḥ prārabheta mahā mune
iha sarvān avāpya arthān viṣṇu lokam sa yāsyati
vimāna karaṇa arthasya karṣaṇasya api sarva saṃpad sādhana tvam
sudarśana vimānasya karṣaṇam yaḥ karoti vai
tasya amitrāḥ vinaśyanti santi sarvāḥ ca saṃpadaḥ
ārabdha aparisamāptasya api vimāna karaṇasya antatas mukti sādhana tā
ārabhya āyatanam madhye vicchittyā vighnitaḥ yadi

original: sa sārvabhaumaḥ sakalān bhuktvā bhogān mahītale |
analyzed: sa sārvabhaumaḥ sakalān bhuktvā bhogān mahī tale
punar ca bhaktaḥ cakrasya śeṣam nirvartayiṣyati
ante vaikuṇṭham āsādya viṣṇu sāyujyam āpnuyāt

original: p. 349) vimānaṃ paramaṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya sudarśanam || 36-40 ||
analyzed: vimānam paramam kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya sudarśanam   /
brāhmaṇān veda viduṣaḥ vaiṣṇavān dvādaśa avarān
tad śeṣa bhūtān tatra eva pratiṣṭhāpya ca śaktitaḥ
paryāpta jīvanān kṛtvā dattvā bhūmi maṭha ādikān
nityam yaḥ abhyarcayati enam devam bhūti samanvitam
tasya pratidinam bhūtiḥ amaryādā vivardhate
nīroga tā dīrgham āyuḥ labhyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
janmāntare sārvabhaumaḥ janitvā sakalām bhuvam
bhuktvā kālena mahatā tad anantara janmani  /
triviṣṭapa patiḥ bhūtvā bhuṅkte ca aindra padam ciram
tatas krameṇa labdhvā ayam tat tat loka īśa tām gataḥ
tad ante paramam dhāma vaiṣṇavam pratipadyate
sudarśana puruṣam an ārādhayataḥ nṛpa tvam durlabham
devam enam an ārādhya na kaścid jāyate nṛpaḥ
etad ārādhana tāratamyāt phala tāratamyam
etad ārādhanasya eva tāratamyena nārada
bhoga āyuṣoḥ tāratamyam aśnute nṛpatiḥ dhruvam
tasmāt rājñām anyeṣām ca etad ārādhana āvaśyaka tā
tasmāt sarva prayatnena rājā eva enam samarcayet

original: p. 350) jātyāyurbhogakāmāśca ye cānye bhuvi mānavāḥ || 36-48 ||
analyzed: jāti āyuḥ bhoga kāmāḥ ca ye ca anye bhuvi mānavāḥ
te api etat pūjayā sarvam kāṅkṣitam prāpnuvanti ca
śeṣiṇaḥ keśava ādeḥ śeṣa bhūtam sudarśanam prati
nāradaḥ
siddham sudarśanam viṣṇoḥ śeṣam āyudha saṃjñitam
katham asya parīvārāḥ keśava ādyāḥ samīritāḥ
viṣṇu ādyāḥ mūrti bhedāḥ ca katham vā pañjarīkṛtāḥ
katham vā bhagavat mantrāḥ parivāra tvam āgatāḥ

original: imaṃ ca saṃśayaṃ deva cchettumarhasi sāmpratam || 36-51 ||
analyzed: imam ca saṃśayam deva chettum arhasi sāmpratam
tad uttara kathana ārambhaḥ
ahirbudhnyaḥ
śṛṇu tāta mahā prājña rahasyam idam uttamam
tvat ṛte śaknuyāt praṣṭum imam artham na kaścana
bhagavataḥ iva tad saṃkalpa rūpasya
sudarśanasya api anādi tva aparicchedya tve
yathā nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣkara īkṣaṇaḥ
anādiḥ aparicchedyaḥ tathā ayam api nārada
tad upapādanāya paramātma śakteḥ dvedhā vibhāgaḥ

original: dve śaktī tasya vidyete viṣṇoḥ sarvārthasādhane |
analyzed: dve śaktī tasya vidyete viṣṇoḥ sarva artha sādhane
pradhāna bhūte yābhyām tu vahati eṣa jagat dhuram

original: p. 351) ekā tvicchātmikā tasya tathānyā tu kriyātmikā |
analyzed: ekā tu icchā ātmikā tasya tathā anyā tu kriyā ātmikā
tatra icchā rūpiṇyāḥ śakteḥ lakṣmī rūpa tvam
prathamā paramā lakṣmīḥ jagattrātuḥ kuṭumbinī
kriyā rūpāyāḥ śakteḥ sudarśana rūpa tvam
tattva vidbhiḥ idam proktam dvitīyā iha sudarśanam
tābhyām śaktibhyām vinā bhagavatā api akiṃcitkaratvam

original: tasmāllakṣmyā vinā devaḥ saṃkalpe na prabhurhariḥ || 36-56 ||
analyzed: tasmāt lakṣmyā vinā devaḥ saṃkalpe na prabhuḥ hariḥ
anena api vinā kartum kiṃcid nā arhati keśavaḥ
tasya śakti dvayasya sṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhāra ādi upakaraṇa tvam

original: anena sarvaṃ sṛjati devo'nenaiva pāti ca || 36-57 ||
analyzed: anena sarvam sṛjati deva ūnena eva pāti ca

original: anena saṃhṛtiṃ devo viśvasyānte karoti ca |
analyzed: anena saṃhṛtim devaḥ viśvasya ante karoti ca
anena dānavān daityān nihanti madhusūdanaḥ
kriyate enena tat karma sarvam sarva gatena vai
rakṣakam paramātmānam prati śakti dvayasya api
rakṣya koṭi antarbhāvaḥ
tasmāt sarva ātmanā ca enam sva buddhyā parirakṣati
viśiṣya lakṣmyāḥ api rakṣya koṭi antarbhāva pratipādanam

original: yathā svaṃ svāminā rakṣyaṃ rakṣyate svayameva hi |
analyzed: yathā svam svāminā rakṣyam rakṣyate svayam eva hi

original: evaṃ sarvasya jananīṃ lakṣmīṃ lakṣmīdharaḥ svayam || 36-60 ||
analyzed: evam sarvasya jananīm lakṣmīm lakṣmīdharaḥ svayam
caturdhā vyūhya ca ātmānam sva bhūtām parirakṣati
atas keśava ādīnām parivāra tva ādi kalpanāyāḥ yukta tvam
tat keśava ādi mūrtīnām parivāra tva kalpanā

original: viṣṇvādīnāṃ ca mūrtīnāṃ pañjaratvaṃ ca yujyate |
analyzed: viṣṇu ādīnām ca mūrtīnām pañjara tvam ca yujyate
sarveṣām api mantrāṇām rakṣaka tvam ca sāṃpratam
prakāra antareṇa api guṇa pradhāna bhāva upapādanam
athavā bhagavān eva svayam cakra sva rūpa dhṛt
avasthitaḥ iti prājñaiḥ kathyate puruṣottamaḥ
prati tretā yugam devaḥ sādhu trāṇa kṛte hariḥ
rāma lakṣmaṇa śatrughna bharata ādi ātmanā svayam
caturdhā avasthitaḥ tadvat cakratmā hariḥ eva hi
guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ tu rāma ādeḥ iva yujyate
tad ātmanā eva ca ātmānam rakṣati eva janārdanaḥ
sva mūrti rakṣaṇe svena vinā anyat na bhavet yatas
etad rahasya śravaṇa ādeḥ api kramaśas parama puruṣa artha sādhana tvam
yaḥ idam śṛṇute paripṛcchati vā
paṭhati smarati iha naraḥ satatam
vipulām iha bhūtim avāpya parā

original: matha yāti padaṃ paramaṃ sa hareḥ || 36-67 ||
analyzed: matha yāti padam paramam sa hareḥ
iti śrī pāñcarātre tantra rahasye ahirbudhnyasaṃhitāyām rājñām
vasthāpanam nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ
āditaḥ ślokāḥ
